entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Cape Race

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 04:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers changing to rain showers this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
